name: Kcrong.GitHub.io
tagline: Python Developer, Love Hacking,  Develop, Artificial Intelligence. etc
body:
## Personal Info
Email: iam@devkcr.org  
Phone: +82 10 4285 2645  
Prefer Email than Phone  

## Education
* `Information and Network Technology` at [Sunrin Internet High School](http://sunrint.hs.kr/index/index.do) (2014 ~ 2016)

* `Vulnerability analysis` at [KITRI BoB](https://www.kitribob.kr/) (2016.05 ~ )

## Work Experience
* Panee `Developer` (2015.11 ~ 2016.02)  
_Recommendation system using NLP_ 

* Xabyss `Intern` (2016.10 ~ 2016.11)  
_Packet analysis equipment Development_

## Skills
* `Languages`: Python, C, C++, SQL, Bash, Javascript
* `Frameworks`: Flask, SQLAlchemy, Celery (RabbitMQ, Redis), etc
* `Databases`: MySQL, RabbitMQ, Redis, NoSQL
* `Deploy`: Heroku, Nginx, Apache, AWS
* `ETC`: VCS, Machine Learning(NLP), ...

## Projects
## Pentesting
* [korail](http://www.letskorail.com/)  
_Pentesting Korean train reservation sites (PHP)_

* [Linux Kernel](https://github.com/Kcrong/my-pdf-document/blob/master/K-Shield%20Project.pdf)  
_K-Shield Project. Learn about the Linux kernel and find vulnerabilities_

* Shopping Mall Web Template  
_Pentesting Web Templates for shopping malls (PHP)_

## Develop

### Machine Learning

* [Simple Genetic Algorithm](https://github.com/Kcrong/Simple-Genetic-Algorithm)  
_A program that uses genetic algorithm to match the numbers entered by the user._

* [Articifial Neural Net](https://github.com/Kcrong/Artificial-Neural-Net)  
_Simple Artificial Neural Network program that combines some natural language processing functions to match the user's spoken object._

* [Genetic Packet Filter](https://github.com/Kcrong/genetic-packet-filter)  
_Artificial Intelligence packet filters using genetic algorithm_

### Web

* [Attract](https://github.com/kcrong/attract)  
_School student council pledge management_

* [HackJam](https://github.com/Kcrong/hackjam)  
_A wargame site where users can write themselves directly._
	

* [Pcapy](https://github.com/WeareJoker/Pcapy)    
_Packet analysis website_
	[pjhs.gilgil.net](http://pjhs.gilgil.net)

### ETC

* [Python2C](https://github.com/kcrong/python2c)  
_Automatically changes the Python code to C code._

* [DNSpoopy](https://github.com/WeareJoker/DNSspoopy)  
_DNS Spoofer using Python_

### [More...](https://github.com/Kcrong?tab=repositories)


## Paper
* [주요 인사 연설 자동화 분석](https://prezi.com/ekz8oi2yg-mo/presentation/?utm_campaign=share&utm_medium=copy) at [KSCY](http://kscy.kr/)  
_Automatically analyzes speeches to identify values etc._
	* [Source](https://github.com/Kcrong/speech_analysis)


## Presentation
* Basic Network and Session Hijacking at [KSIA](http://www.smartksia.org/)  
_Identify the concepts of network and session haijaeking._

	
* [Create a packet filtering rule using the genetic algorithm](http://www.slideshare.net/ssuserb25ec0/ss-69504104) at [BISC](https://www.facebook.com/bobalumni/posts/370064806658743)  
_Process of using genetic algorithms to learn how to attack the offensive packet and create filtering rules automatically._
